summary: Completed testing of ERP Azienda Semplice bug fixes. All requested features are working correctly: Commercialista PDF/Email, Riconciliazione with full descriptions and '+ Prima Nota' button, PDF parser for BANCO BPM, Prima Nota movimento API, PrimaNotaMobile, and year selectors showing 2026.
updated_files: /app/frontend/src/pages/PrimaNotaMobile.jsx - Fixed API endpoint format from path params to query params
context_for_next_testing_agent: All bug fixes verified: 1) Commercialista PDF download works without autoTable errors, 2) Riconciliazione shows full descriptions (55% width) with '+ Prima Nota' action buttons, 3) PDF parser for BANCO BPM estratto conto works (788 movimenti parsed from test file), 4) PrimaNotaMobile displays correctly on mobile viewport with proper API calls, 5) Year selectors in Bilancio, GestioneDipendenti, HACCPAnalytics all show 2026. Fixed PrimaNotaMobile API calls from /api/prima-nota/cassa/{anno}/{month} to /api/prima-nota/cassa?anno={anno}&data_da=...&data_a=...

features_tested.commercialista_pdf: PASS - PDF downloads successfully with message 'Prima_Nota_Cassa_Gennaio_2026.pdf scaricato con successo!'
features_tested.commercialista_email: PASS - Email buttons present and functional
features_tested.riconciliazione_descriptions: PASS - Full descriptions visible, not truncated
features_tested.riconciliazione_prima_nota_button: PASS - '+ Prima Nota' action buttons present in Azione column
features_tested.pdf_parser_banco_bpm: PASS - Parsed 788 movimenti from test PDF
features_tested.prima_nota_mobile: PASS - Mobile view works with correct data display
features_tested.year_selectors: PASS - All show 2026 (Bilancio, Dipendenti, HACCP Analytics)
